page.title: 04BRANSCOMBE LACE MAKING.
page.content: Branscombe lace making has been famous for many years. Most people started lace making because it was the tradition .Years ago people could not afford food so they made lace to pay for the food.Often sitting in the open doorway to use the evening light. There are lots of different patterns to make in lace. We were shown some patterns called prickings, which are pinned with special pins that do not rust on to a lace cushion. The cushion is filled with the chaff of wheat. Lace making is not very easy. The special thread made of cotton was bought in skeins. It was then wound on to lace bobbins before use. Lace also made locally at Beer and Honiton but each lace has its own special characteristics.
